attributes.action: Abolish planned accomodation for 1100 single male asylum seekers in HU16
attributes.additional_details: Stop the housing of more asylum seekers in Cottingham. We do not have the facilities to house more single males to the area.
attributes.background: To stop the housing of 1100 male asylum seekers in the village of Cottingham. We are a small village that is over populated already. There is a nearby school.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition, it has been reported that plans to house 1,100 asylum seekers in Cottingham will not go ahead.
